fullName.jp: セシル・ハーヴィ（暗黒騎士）

description.jp:
軍事国家バロンの飛空艇団「赤い翼」の
隊長。闇の力『暗黒剣』の使い手だが
本人は真面目で優しい人物。
親友の竜騎士団長カインと共に国王の与
えた任務にあたるも 国王の非道な行い
に疑問を抱き 祖国を離れて旅をする身
となる。
description.gl: An earnest and kind individual with a dark past as the commander of the Red Wings、 the air force of Baron. On a royal mission with his best friend Kain、 he starts to question the morality of the king、 driving him to leave his homeland and set out on a new path.

jp.text: ただ君を\n守らせてくれないか……
謝るのは僕の方だ\nそれも謝って済むような\nことじゃない……
君の力がいる！\n一緒に 戦ってくれるな？
行こう 僕らの戦いに！
この暗黒騎士の姿同様\n僕の心も……！
我々は バロンの『赤い翼』だ！
これは僕自身との戦いだ！

gl.text: But、 please...at least allow me to protect you.
You've nothing to apologize for. It is I who've wronged you、 and apologies cannot right the things I've done.
You'll help us fight、 won't you? We could use your help now more than ever.
I've worn this darkened armor for so long now、 there's no mote of light left in me.
We are the Red Wings of Baron!
This is a fight for me and me alone!

name.jp: あんこくエクステンド

desc.en:
[Darkness] use +2

When using [Darkness]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 6
• Increases total BRV potency by 150%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
• [MAX BRV Up] effect +25%; duration +4
• Self: 4 turns [Power of Darkness] 
• HP attack after use

When HP is less than 50% of MAX
• [Darkness] becomes [Darkness+]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 60%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
　∟ Self: 4 turns [Light within Darkness]

While [Power of Darkness] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 80%)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Cancels [Light within Darkness] after use

[Power of Darkness]
• Raises Max BRV by 10%, Attack by 30%
• Reduces HP damage taken by 10%

[Light within Darkness]
• Restores BRV by 60% of INT BRV
desc.gl:
Darkness use +2

When using Darkness:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • 6 turns slight boost to MAX BRV Up
 • Self: 4 turns Power of Darkness
 • Triggers additional HP attack on selected target after use

While HP less than 50% of MAX:
 • Darkness becomes Darkness+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; self: 4 turns Light within Darkness)

While Power of Darkness active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; cancels Light within Darkness)
desc.jp:
「あんこく」の使用回数＋2

「あんこく」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が6HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
・自身に2ACTION「最大BRVアップ」付与の
　効果小アップを追加し さらに4ACTION期間延長
・自身に4ACTION「暗黒の力」付与
・使用後 ターゲットに追加HP攻撃が発動

自身のHPが最大HPの50％未満の時
「あんこく」が「あんこく＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・BRV威力中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分に変化
・自身に4ACTION「闇に宿る光」付与

「暗黒の力」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「HP攻撃＋」に変化
・近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・「闇に宿る光」解除

short_desc.jp: バフアタックブーストアップ：最大BRVと攻撃力がアップ

name.jp: ヴァリアントブロウエクステンド

desc.en:
[Valiant Blow] use +1

When using [Valiant Blow]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Increases total BRV potency by 240%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• [ATK Up] effect +10%, duration +3
• Self: 4 turns [Power of Darkness]
• HP attack after use
• Increases allies' BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt

When HP is less than 50% of MAX
• [Valiant Blow] becomes [Valiant Blow+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 6
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 90%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 50% HP Damage to non-targets
　∟ Increases allies' BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt to target
　∟ Self: 4 turns [Light within Darkness]

While both [Power of Darkness] and [Light within Darkness] are active
• [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+] become [BRV Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
　∟ Recovers own HP by 20% of HP damage dealt (limit 5% of Max HP)
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] become [HP Attack++]
　∟ Melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 80%)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Recovers own HP by 50% of HP damage dealt (limit 20% of Max HP)
　∟ Cancels [Light within Darkness] after use
desc.gl:
Valiant Blow use +1

When using Valiant Blow:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • 8 turns slight boost to ATK Up
 • Self: 4 turns Power of Darkness
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
 • Grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt

While HP less than 50% of MAX:
 • Valiant Blow becomes Valiant Blow+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; slight boost to BRV granted based on HP damage dealt to selected target; self: 4 turns Light within Darkness)

While Power of Darkness, Light within Darkness active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage over BRV Attack; slightly restores own HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP; cancels Light within Darkness)
desc.jp:
「ヴァリアントブロウ」の使用回数＋1

「ヴァリアントブロウ」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・自身に5ACTION「攻撃力アップ」付与の
　効果小アップを追加し さらに3ACTION期間延長
・自身に4ACTION「暗黒の力」付与
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動
・与えたHPダメージに依存した量のBRVを
　自身以外の味方全員に加算

自身のHPが最大HPの50％未満の時
「ヴァリアントブロウ」が「ヴァリアントブロウ＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が6HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分に変化
・ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・ターゲットに与えたHPダメージに依存した量のBRV加算量小アップ
・自身に4ACTION「闇に宿る光」付与

「暗黒の力」「闇に宿る光」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」「BRV攻撃＋」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　通常「BRV攻撃」よりも合計BRV威力大アップ
・与えたBRVダメージに応じて自身のHP小回復
　回復量の上限は 自身の最大HPの5％分
通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が以下の「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化
・近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・与えたHPダメージに応じて自身のHP中回復
　回復量の上限は 自身の最大HPの20％分
・「闇に宿る光」解除

desc.en:
When using [Dark Cannon]
• Becomes a 6-HIT Dark ranged BRV attack + HP attack delivered twice
• Increases total BRV potency by 300%
• Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets on first HP attack
• Deals 20% of total HP damage dealt to target, to non-targets on second HP attack
• Enables [Darkness+], [Valiant Blow+] for 1 use regardless of HP
* Requires relevant Extend passives

While both [Power of Darkness] and [Light within Darkness] are active and HP is at least 50% of MAX
• [BRV Attack] and variants become [BRV Attack++ (Power)]
　∟ 4-HIT Dark melee BRV attack (70% per hit)
　∟ Consumes 20% of own HP
• [HP Attack] and variants become [HP Attack++ (Power)]
　∟ 3-HIT Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack (70% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
　∟ Consumes 20% of own HP

While [Power of Darkness] and [Light within Darkness] are active, and HP is less than 50% of MAX
• [BRV Attack] and variants become [BRV Attack++ (Heal)]
　∟ 3-HIT Dark melee BRV attack (70% per hit)
　∟ Recovers own HP by 20% of damage dealt (limit 20% of Max HP)
• [HP Attack] and variants become [HP Attack++ (Heal)]
　∟ 2-HIT Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack (80% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Recovers own HP by 50% of damage dealt (limit 30% of Max HP)
desc.gl:
When using Dark Cannon:
 • 6-hit Dark ranged BRV attack + HP attack becomes 6-hit Dark ranged BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • First HP attack deals 20% HP damage to non-targets; second HP attack deals 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt to target to non-targets

Enables Darkness+ after use while Darkness Extension equipped
Enables Valiant Blow+ after use while Valiant Blow Extension equipped
Darkness+, Valiant Blow+ remain enabled until used

While Power of Darkness, Light within Darkness active and HP at least 50% of MAX:
 • BRV Attack/+/++ becomes BRV Attack++ (Power) (4-hit Dark melee BRV attack; slightly consumes HP upon use)
 • HP Attack/+/++ becomes HP Attack++ (Power) (3-hit Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; slightly consumes HP upon use)

While Power of Darkness, Light within Darkness active and HP less than 50% of MAX:
 • BRV Attack/+/++ becomes BRV Attack++ (Heal) (3-hit Dark melee BRV attack; slightly restores own HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP)
 • HP Attack/+/++ becomes HP Attack++ (Heal) (2-hit Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 30% of own MAX HP)
